attributes.action: continue to help Mrs Johnson (Keith Bennett's mother) to look for her son' body who was murdered by Myra Hindley and Ian Brady
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Police and other authorities should still continue to look for Keith's body on the Yorkshire Moors.  Mrs Johnson should not be able to die without knowing where her child is.  This is so cruel and my heart goes out to her.  I would help if I could and I'm sure a lot of other people would also.  Please, please find her little boy's body before she dies so that she can die in peace.  Ian Brady should be made to tell.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
